ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Prof. Goodwin, I just installed Cantera153.msi first on the second HD D: (where Python2.3.3 is installed), then on the main one C: and tried the

Subject: cantera-python installation trouble
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=164148692
X-Yahoo-Profile: gfcoppola

Dear Prof. Goodwin,

I just installed Cantera153.msi first on the second HD
"D:"(where Python2.3.3 is installed), then on the main
one "C:" and tried the Mixmaster and tut1.py for
testing.
The result is the same.
---------------------------------------------
I get the following error from Mixmaster:

could not create gas mixture object: gri30
could not create gas mixture object: air
could not create gas mixture object: h2o2

the file ct2ctml contains the following message:
"The system cannot find the path specified."

I also tried to run .check and .cttmp and they work
just fine.
---------------------------------------------

I get the following error from tut1.py:

The system cannot find the path specified.

cmd /C c:/python23/python ./.check.py>> log 2>&1

########################################################################

The Cantera Python interface is required in order to
process
Cantera input files, but it does not seem to be
correctly installed.

Check that you can invoke the Python interpreter with 
the command "python", and that typing "from Cantera
import *"  
at the Python prompt does not produce an error. If
Python on your system
is invoked with some other command, set environment
variable PYTHON_CMD
to the full path to the Python interpreter. 

#########################################################################

Exception exceptions.AttributeError: "XML_Node
instance has no attribute '_xml_id'" in Exception
exceptions.AttributeError: "Solution instance has no
attribute '_models'" in Traceback (most recent call
last):
  File "C:\Program
Files\Cantera153\tutorials\Python\tut1.py", line 14,
in ?
    gas1 = GRI30()
  File
"D:\PROGRA~1\PYTHON23\Lib\site-packages\Cantera\gases.py",
line 33, in GRI30
    return Solution(src="gri30.cti", id="gri30")
  File
"D:\PROGRA~1\PYTHON23\Lib\site-packages\Cantera\solution.py",
line 40, in __init__
    root = XML.XML_Node(name = 'doc', src = src,
preprocess = 1)
  File
"D:\PROGRA~1\PYTHON23\Lib\site-packages\Cantera\XML.py",
line 35, in __init__
    self._xml_id = _cantera.xml_get_XML_File(src)
error: 
Procedure: ct2ctml
Error:   could not convert input file to CTML
 command line was: c:/python23/python ./.cttmp.py>
ct2ctml.log 2>&1
Error in Python installation.
----------------------------------------------------

I also made sure I can invoke the Python interpreter
with the command "python", and that typing "from
Cantera import *" does not produce any error.

the file ct2ctml contains the following message:
"The system cannot find the path specified."

I also tried to run .check and .cttmp and they work
just fine.

Copy of the gri30 XML and .gti are in the working
directory as well.
---------------------------------------------------

Do you have any suggestion ?

I already used an older version of Cantera and Python
on my computer, both on the HD "D:" and everything was
fine.

Many thanks for your help.

Gianfilippo Coppola
